До Димитър Иванов

Здравейте Димитър, 

Исках да се уверя, че сте получили предишния ми мейл?
Като управител от Тибиел ЕООД предположих, че Вие сте човекът, с който мога да обсъдя как Вашата компания може да бъде по-успешна в:
    ✅ Продажбите <http://tracking.sirmainsurtech.com/tracking/click?d=pgh3K1KwKAQfKBUFQPtVy2dt5Em_XQEyEf6hkpkL6HDEpNb1YMHI-uTCzEnmmKUa5zIy0A1bI0Uoxf0APDZ5B3r5AAlcCnUcEJ8GicKBQ6znwKRCP4rHqCpOoIcYvFLA4emBq0nNj3Ur54q07w5SrSdHtq8lOhLdY-lJMNWij8GbPHww6-2uNFJqRYqetpQOA_8x3Uxx6naMyFjs0UQ3ySs3XnX2bpseFIjc14Li31cCjIEqW2QjnPnYuQNwK8X1yGN4e-EY4DiwXlLhb5EtJVJ6I6qhhhfQgsjnjrg0M9N3Q4rqFaLlMg7uKk_uF_cH0HbbxQHLtHKakypo7zJ1mpQ1> 
    ✅ Обслужването <http://tracking.sirmainsurtech.com/tracking/click?d=qCv3S6yalnZFmOBdXny-1ygZWOtRda_vMAH88NeBtdMPkJ3DmiWUbZkaPRIkIAz9J-KV6sn-QSoaOZv9SpEqbxRaA6uix2uLU5NpV4U_jAazdS9wCZfmunO3v7tvFwWq_YdPEyE8PPQj060Kunuo3f8lilYvgAOJQUXizzSxKy-UPhOd_6uNJM8aICYB0Ct5Gs-NKLlSqS8UkXabjdBHT67JxjmOxGChWMGNIgW59N7GZYoJEASmvnXgIQ4ZIV4uvS_7ESog6B7zYdt_ngh3n-WKc1CPNJUxOrh5vaqhaYvSDwTY3tVwWmOtYV-TL8fgp46C3S2y8FY8BxLzfG4hri81> 
    ✅ Маркетинга <http://tracking.sirmainsurtech.com/tracking/click?d=i4FOtC8KdvnO0SPxQaaeTOGH1FKsDerPVAfoQ_Tw5_Urtr_yl61jPk8HSNi4NSIEKZayQPSRIWtM7Mr67Kqe00MeNYhjX64YvUVBjoqRomTJsRqYUGUjpEIJuVn50eFPXdd3olhVXUKzjgzGZfHqOOE6vPGf4AsPg_7qqRNmg_NCNZMQDf5fRtvnjca-4G1i1pirRdgDlcZDe4dgBsmIdLq3ieNoTTLtvk1TXYgy_3VcmtJBAbno84Sb3MX0HPvOXq9lFqOcH6QZ-wgpjBlX36YRkqHscH8qPDNfcCLFSEBX3SeROJ9_temqIkBJhKud_9zevqCdOVZeSiYwD4fSrLWN2ItQFJL5dsTx_p2CXaT-0> 

Много компании ни споделят, че техните екипи прекарват повече време в административни задачи, от колкото да се фокусират върху по-приоритетни. Ако това е валидно и за Вас, то може би ще е полезно да погледнете следните решения на глобалната CRM платформа на Creatio <http://tracking.sirmainsurtech.com/tracking/click?d=YhoFaPuce4PS5EzBo10KWMFzZLde1dhYaTTTMMu22H32JXTDrmlp9QjdC_lsqTNyxEh5MVOhXB-gkiKuG6wV2olrmzGgj6XdHNH0LLyh6wHS6tR76Djld44EE0T1LkRbQRLfSncuZuyQCJK45bF1pR7k1D60byMxHf5foYqAarXg4G1eahLmEWWqULbiwhg8pU_mbBggXIPZ2tfgEJoE9X0aHRvrwyIQF3o61zMQNiJ1zNvUgQVN8eoalklyPyNiT6ROz_33rVt5rz0kG9b6TjZ6m1563qyAFpuDAu6W3vczVb8ZQ5uK4IvGplLJw87cgW1Wce1IBf2kXYoX0Mu_N901>  - за автоматизиране на работни процеси. *	Manufacturing workflows management <http://tracking.sirmainsurtech.com/tracking/click?d=mrD3YJiN0FHqEzy6eDoct1TPwxmqWYIubVoWA2eo7CEHrfW9P91C_Jb094YvNlAhkjHa94vXlUBoZCD-RWdtmavn6J7zoSZgZ49OHoG2-CTkef-EXZNXnfKtqBDWE44Rda0iMhrYymFO-nJGXobiNYQ1ovIuEOf0JDZQ1u2FgV89puY0Wcshrues-2XDoz3gWbUwpirimdnb1NDDLGOTlCu0jqeNfnEEifz58I_4nA4CSYVAb2pMJvu937Q56LI0ApqneY7uhVdjfvJueOXz1VknBM90-XS6RSSe0LbfBNgo6jJkkLLDObZkeoJdVsprmQnvE_HP5-Np2yd8gp6gSJzgB1y8oK7EwrKT_ykROcfEggJPNZWhOi61cIvVPpAIZA2> 
*	Retail workflows and CRM <http://tracking.sirmainsurtech.com/tracking/click?d=4LNC8dmY__vY8rp43CnEIH-8H3J_FhfJoGUxjUO0TEP5V9GlWKrJaiclmWkERFCE7cIohqHSq0BMOuy4MwHDrtHymrt8usgyCVdwVybHZnbcgdJlw_Ur_lT6gEWKUpcW36x6mezSOrv-CHKVr1SSpWqmnAtWTsIIyYPAkc-y6E5qsnniRyn59F81hch_EaDroyAHRsBgAsEkI2zaPsOY63iUr1WlAI18ecmyI05fNPt_waOpISzgljuPr3gJ4AA1Eb6r2K9eABf9L_nLr_mS3my6KuFX7MmYe4QVjHRS8PkcIhVIJlSzUNLTei2j5qGffefSvKZScI6r7eWUpzQx3XYO6dqnwUiRF-VmFjenBJj30> 
*	И много други индустрии <http://tracking.sirmainsurtech.com/tracking/click?d=gk2PsMSWTjx2CECkI4D22oHOg7kBTf32DY6IeVynpb9_YAwEIJP0o6gDTqZIBHYECNYsmtlTL9gmSYLcIsOtN8YMCCc1-qDQACGKXy0jFkvMVtn9J-Lkz5o7KDBdNWLA2-yS7ZuokPIippDF_4z4juVJgKkvpKcM8UGFbMG4mAedO2TWkkx0Bs6nlfgVQURzcA9xEvqZivQKFi6CkPJYXxzHmOLS2vUtRWtN5FAE-1Mo_OrqPMFlyRGREzYmky3jE_zue1rsNFA1iWRtardHcdE-1FN3E4L9JYpJg_GxxeJ3Mr5r5ThpDteereD3egRWDlLL3_yOhghWcW0_qV-mL0_i4wHrH2NXvlrwqroriiZu0> ...

ℹ  С помощта на тези решения може да постигнете значителни резултати и да генерирате в пъти повече нови възможности. Ако се интересувате и искате да научите повече, ще се радвам да предоставя повече информация.

Разгледайте приложението му и обхвата на бизнес процесите - LINK  <http://tracking.sirmainsurtech.com/tracking/click?d=gk2PsMSWTjx2CECkI4D22oHOg7kBTf32DY6IeVynpb9_YAwEIJP0o6gDTqZIBHYECNYsmtlTL9gmSYLcIsOtN9wupGoc1LUz6zZ4mVGIOB1G4YS95OOLkjpfNeCL2VUCBaIOy1jtGVv_thLONuDfi8ibL82MSiL2O6zPXFAVDzyNYUmwB-3JwxdiB2HeYJh7chjf3ei8f30LYAQiFbBcfYdc1pRl1kbEvMtOPL9vKe6Ve_ryY9rGj5wlAabdab5ln8M6i_rNCar0jqht6zDO_Ym1uH5j67867u3a5bQMeUJOmJ2yq_x3lh2kHKUjMSohcVPDOHY3DP-4Y6-kS6DMhrApYveg3x8Yt6hfgFqZUlfU0>

Sirma InsurTech <http://tracking.sirmainsurtech.com/tracking/click?d=i1dvmVZuQkhb13gIurVlv5k66eY-p5nI6zviL5j9aEjzar4LtED0eEPzWWZA2WBJujdNlklMLMbnEr7iG4x4fO4-L4wONPGXA4qO9d3wByXElEamYn7t8ognUJ5byqKZOhkoozbVDe1T5l3UEgKC94ytYaA29HbUvDpIns93jFXDvsy_AL9xGSCItdwu-MqF_XjULcFZeV7YfA4kSEQO1JI2DexkrctFqhKA4RTLo5s7zja3QHty8I6wqSw7sAhGIaIpRe-bwKG50vhWT3jtguHV_GyQ8jb1dcUaFlpNZNOlEMFPYcXDfMDrBoYY22iCXk6S-VSIIyWk3jyZW2DcAg-LHjs1DUrcsSbb89w6vVb70>  е ИТ консултантска компания с основна дейност внедряване на софтуерни решения за управление на бизнеса.
